(:action store
  ; Store an item and update its status
  :parameters (?item - object ?person - person ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (at ?item ready-to-store) (at ?person available) (at ?location storage-place))
  :effect (and (at ?item stored) (not (at ?item ready-to-store))

(:action hang
  :parameters (?item - object ?person - person ?place - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?item stored) (at ?person home) (at ?place towel-rack))
  :effect (and (at ?item hanging) (not (at ?item stored))
